title: Small and unreadable
comment: Cons: Not so much that the tiles are small. They are hard to read. Tried most of the tilesets except one. No joy. Bigger tiles with a nice readable colour would be nice. Probably not keeper.   Pros: First game I ever saw that was actually free.
Hasn't been up dated since mid 2013  guess they gave up on all the problems , pity as it could of been good
There's an update in the pipeline! But as development is taking place in our free time, it sometimes takes some time... Sorry for any inconvenience.

title: Fun & Simple
comment: Excellent free & open source implementation of Shishen Sho. No ads.

title: These games are for all ages I am 73 and love them and my Great Grand children also like to play too. They play with Gramma or by themselves. Old things like this never grow old.
Jetzt auch hier?
comment: Super! Vorher hatte ich es nur auf meinem Mac aber dank dir konnte meine Ma das jetzt auch auf dem Smartphone geniessen! Thank you lots! 5 Stars!
